HeroDescription: Authentic Turkish Döner, freshly prepared with the best ingredients from the Ansbach region.
DonerKebabDesc: Classic Döner in pita bread with fresh salad and homemade sauces
DonerTascheDesc: Döner in a crispy pocket with salad and sauce
DonerTellerDesc: Döner meat with sides, salad and sauce on a plate
DonerBoxDesc: Döner meat with fries, salad and sauce in a convenient box
IskenderDesc: Traditional İskender with yogurt, tomato sauce and butter
LahmacunDesc: Thin flatbread with minced meat and spices
YufkaDesc: Döner wrapped in soft yufka dough
IngredientsDescription: We use only the freshest ingredients and highest quality meat for our Döner specialties. Every day starts with careful selection of our products.
QualityDescription: At Aras Döner, quality comes first. Our recipes are traditionally passed down and prepared with great attention to detail. Come by and convince yourself!
